member.name: T:BuddyFeature.Vocal.QuestionAnalysed
member.summary: Use this function in order to get the Type of question found
member.remarks: The value is a string and can be a lot of different things like Babyphone, VolumeUp

member.name: T:BuddyFeature.Vocal.VocalChat
member.summary: This provides a standard vocal feature for basic question answering through pre-answered questions wolfram alpha queries and/or cleverbot answering

member.name: P:BuddyFeature.Vocal.VocalChat.WithNotification
member.summary: Authorizes automatic notification display after STT recognition or error. True as default

member.name: P:BuddyFeature.Vocal.VocalChat.OnQuestionTypeFound
member.summary: Use this callback to know the Question type found (as string)
